lines.text:
[after hiring Joan Wyndham as his nurse]
My man will show you out. He's listening at the door.
Tell me, doctor, what would it cost to enable you to finish your experiments?
What I want to do is surround myself with the finest scientists in the world in the short time I have left, and I haven't very long to live, you know. Cost? Uh... twenty thousand pounds.
I'm prepared to find that sum for you.
He's here at my invitation and he'll go at mine.
Everything I've lived for is within my grasp, and I'm not going to have it snatched away from me now.
